Body:
hmd = ccl.halos.MassDef200m()
hmdb = ccl.halos.MassDef200c()
for M in [1000000000000.0, [1000000000000.0, 2000000000000.0], np.array([
    1000000000000.0, 2000000000000.0])]:
    m = hmd.translate_mass(COSMO, M, 1.0, hmdb)
    assert np.all(np.isfinite(m))
    assert np.shape(m) == np.shape(M)
